title: 87 Prime Day Furniture Deals (2024) AD's Editors Are Shopping
description: Score up to 70% off home during Amazon’s biggest sale of the year
author: Audrey Lee, Julia Harrison
excerpt: Prime Day furniture deals; Living room: SIMPLIHOME Bookcase (was $400, now $355); Outdoor: Walker Edison Dining Set (was $1,005, now $736)
text: Once again, Amazon is here to support your quest for a full home refresh with Prime Day furniture deals. The megaretailer’s Prime Big Deal Days is slated through today, 10/9, and we’re bringing you all the discounts on must-have items. Whether you’re searching for new pieces ahead of winter entertaining or simply sleuthing for a great deal, there are a lot of markdowns for Prime members to enjoy (among other Amazon home deals we’ve spotted).If you've shopped the sale before, you know that the Prime Day furniture deals are nothing to scoff at. We typically see deep discounts during the two-day event on everything from living room furniture to outdoor furniture, kitchenware to home office chairs.From top-of-the-line sofas to lounge chairs and barstools, you can start nesting for the season in one fell swoop. Keep scrolling to snag the best Prime Big Deal Days furniture steals of the moment, and be sure to check back throughout the sales event for updated deals. You can also learn more about our Amazon favorites, review our top choices for under $100 products, furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels too.Living Room Furniture DealsHome Decor DealsOutdoor Furniture DealsSmart home and tech DealsShop Top Amazon Prime Day Furniture Deals By Category:Best Living Room Furniture Deal: Vesgantti Velvet Loveseat (was $250, now $160)Best Home Decor Deal: Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Wool Area Rug (was $289, now $98)Best Outdoor Furniture Deals: Walker Edison Chevron Outdoor Dining Set (was $1,005, now $736)Best Smart Home and Tech Deals: Apple AirPods (3rd Gen) (was $169, now $130)Living Room Furniture DealsFinding the best Amazon Prime furniture can definitely feel like a challenge–there’s just SO much of it to comb through–which is why we’ve gone ahead and done it for you. Whether you’re looking for a modest home office upgrade, some extra storage, or in the mood to splurge on a comfy sectional sofa, check back here to find all of the best furniture deals from this year’s sale.Vesgantti Velvet LoveseatThis two-seater sofa with memory foam cushioning is great for cramped apartments or even an entryway. We especially like the stylish green velvet upholstery, though it’s available in a more neutral gray as well.Walker Edison 3-Drawer Mid-Century Modern TV StandGo ahead, switch up your tired TV stand for this one with ample storage. Use the drawers to stash things you don't want people to see, like a speaker, records, or extra coffee table books. It fits up to a 65-inch TV, and the roomy drawers will store extra blankets, electronic odds and ends, and more.Novogratz Brittany Sofa FutonOur advice? Never sleep on a Novogratz deal, regardless of the time of year. This cute, quilted option functions as a love seat and a sleeper sofa. If the leather look isn't your style, there are a handful of other on-sale fabric options to choose from, too.Jiexi Modern Boucle Accent ChairThis trendy boucle armchair is fit for reading, snoozing, lounging, and catching up on your favorite shows. Pop it in the living room and throw a cozy knit blanket over top for major hygge vibes.Christopher Knight Home Kama Patio TableBuild your dream dining set with this table that can live indoors or out. With a solid acacia wood tabletop and sturdy metal legs, it’s the ideal piece to feast upon.Christopher Knight Home Hikaru Fabric Storage OttomanNot only will you be getting a lovely seat with this tufted pick from Christopher Knight Home, but you’ll land some discreet storage space too.Nathan James Mina Rattan NightstandThe rattan detailing on this side table gives the piece a light and airy quality that we absolutely love.Roundhill Furniture Tuchico Contemporary Accent ChairIn need of a new office chair? We recommend considering a nice accent chair over something generic that swivels. This lovely tufted pick will make WFH a little more chic.Marshall 3-Shelf Metal Rolling Utility CartNext on our furniture sale list is this utility cart that'll come in handy whether you use it for storage or as a bar cart.Sweetcrispy Office ChairIf you’re after ergonomics, you won’t go wrong with this adjustable swivel desk chair, which touts more than 800 five-star reviews.Flash Furniture Porter High Back Ergonomic Office ChairHere's another deal for the WFH crowd. This ergonomic desk chair has an understated design to appeal to any minimalist, but it's also available in eight different colors, including vibrant orange, purple, and red.Novogratz Chandler Indoor/Outdoor Dining Chairs (Set of 4)Have a little fun with your dining chairs and scoop up these chic blue designs. They'd also look right at home in a kids' room or on the deck.CANMOV Adjustable Accent Chair with OttomanThis easy, breezy chair is also currently on sale and there's a foot rest included. Is that a sign to buy two?BANTI Standing DeskIf you’re among the select few people who did not stress-buy a standing desk a few years ago, you’ve got another opportunity during Prime Day. Banti's popular desks are a minimalist’s dream, and they’re easy to adjust on the fly.ZINUS SmartBase Tool-Free Assembly Mattress FoundationThis casual (and convertible!) platform bed frame from Zinus is a smart choice if you're looking to outfit a guest room or draw focus to other areas of your boudoir.Mid Century Modern End TableThe cutout detailing on this end table gives the piece a light and airy quality that we absolutely love.Furinno Basic 3-Tier BookcaseNext on our furniture sale list is this three-tier bookcase that'll come in handy whether you use it as extra storage for your home office or a makeshift nightstand.Casper Sleep Original Foam Full Size MattressCasper's original memory foam mattress is 15% off right now, meaning it's finally time to upgrade your sleep setup. Available in a twin, twin XL, full, king, and queen size, sleepers can enjoy the three different layers built for advanced lumbar support and a 10-year warranty on the purchase.Flash Furniture Hercules Series Rustic Solid Pine Folding Dining TableThis adaptable dining table can be used both indoors and out, meaning you're really getting a great bargain—especially if you love to host in the spring and summer.Orange Factory Cross Legged Office ChairThis TikTok-approved desk chair is deeply discounted for Prime Day. If you've seen it all on your FYP, consider this your time to score a deal.Elitespace Memory Foam MattressUpgrade your mattress with this model from Elitespace. It stands a substantial 10 inches tall and uses two different types of foam to deliver pressure relief to all kinds of sleepers.Yaheetech Rocking Chair NurseryBuilding a nursery? A design-forward rocking chair should keep things both stylish and functional when it’s it’s time for bed or to settle down with a story book.Armen Living Butterfly Dining ChairAt more than 60% off, this rounded dining chair with a midcentury-esque shape is a yes from us.Alisend Small Desk with BookshelfThis writing desk may have a slim silhouette, but the addition of a riser means you’ve got an extra level of storage space to work with.Yechen Shoe Storage OrganizerYou need a space to contain items you use daily, like shoes and bags. With this shoe organizer, you can add it to your entryway, bedroom closet, or anywhere else that might need a little extra organization.Cloud Coffee TableThis coffee table brings whimsy into the room without being saccharine about it. We love the modern design element of irregular shapes, which always seem to bring a welcome carefreeness to spaces that can be otherwise stuffy. Not to mention we won’t miss hitting our shins on the sharp coffee table corners.Belffin 4 Seater Sectional Sofa with Reversible ChaiseIf there’s going to be an amazing Prime Day sale, it’s going to be a couch. This one has a cool seaming detail that’s reminding us of Ralph Lauren Home. An L-shaped sofa does a lot to fill your space with little effort, and this one can fit the whole friend group for a movie night. You can stow your blankets in the storage ottoman!SimpliHome Erina Acacia Wood BookcaseA sturdy foundation for your robust library and favorite trinkets is a must. This handsome design can work in just about any room in your home.Winsome 3-Piece Ancona Wine Cabinet Modular SetAspiring sommeliers and seasoned wine aficionados can appreciate this dark wood wine cabinet that more than 50% off right now.SimpliHome Banting Industrial BookcaseGet the best of both worlds with this shelf that comes equipped with a little bit of drawer storage to discreetly hide any junk.Bme Vivian Deluxe Bed Frame with HeadboardHere's a Scandi-inspired bed frame with a detailed headboard that'll make your bedroom feel a bit more sophisticated.CHITA Braid ArmchairThe unexpected braided detail on this armchair gives it an organic feel, and a nice 20% off discount means you'll be getting a great deal on your new favorite seat.Sunmory Tree BookshelfCreatively display your favorite coffee table books and magazines with this tree bookshelf that'll surely add interest.Colamy Midcentury Modern Dining Chairs (Set of 4)Upgrading your mismatched dining chairs with something sleek (and a little sexy) is easy with this discounted set of four.Aprtat Bamboo Dining BenchYou could really put this very versatile bench anywhere in your space. We think it might look especially nice at the foot of your bed or near your entry way for easy shoe application.NeuType Full Length MirrorMirror, mirror, now on sale—not grabbing this deal would be an epic fail!Pipishell Bamboo Stackable End Tables (Set of 2)Right now you can get not one, but two attractive side tables for the price of one—for under $50, no less.FurSch Fluted Buffet Sideboard CabinetThis stylish cabinet would make a fine addition to your entryway or as a living room console that'll help you store excess wires and spare remote controls.Best Amazon Prime Day Furniture Deals: Home DecorLights! Camera! Prime! Looking to get your home AD Open Door-level stylish? To start, we think this Prime Day is the right occasion to finally change up your home decor—starting with your old lighting scheme and finishing with an area rug (or two). Since even the smallest accents can make a difference, we think it’s definitely worth checking out Amazon’s decor selection—especially if you’re looking for the perfect finishing touch to a well-designed space.Loloi Chris Loves Julia x Polly Area RugThe great thing about a lower pile area rug like this lovely design from Loloi is that it won't shed as much as loftier options. This neutral pattern is available in five different sizes but there's lots of other colorways to choose from, too.Worhe Italy Marble Vanity TrayAdd this handsome marble tray to your coffee table and fill it with collectible matchboxes or in the bathroom to display your fragrance collection.Harritpure Arched Full Length MirrorHere's a full length mirror that'll make sending fit pics to the group chat way easier. We like that it has an arched top to give it a softer look.Folkulture Fruit BowlAvailable in three striking color combinations, we think this colorful bowl looks way more expensive than its $40 price tag.C APPOK Artificial Tulip FlowersThese faux blooms will last a lifetime—but this discount won't, so add to cart while you can!Kosta Boda Contrast VaseIf you're on the hunt for something splurge worthy, look no further than this on-sale vase from Kosta Boda. It's hand-crafted and discounted by 25% right now.Serax Glass Fish Water PitcherThere's nothing fishy about this deal—here's an amphibious vase that might look extra nice with a few of those faux tulips peeping out.ECOESPTI Touch Mini Dimmable LampThe magic of a bedside lamp that charges your phone could never be lost on us—what luxury. These bedside lamps are dimmable so you can settle into your nighttime reading (or scrolling) with leisure.LEPOWER Wood Tripod Floor LampIt can be hard to find some balance between functional and design-y, especially at a reasonable price point. This does the trick, with a nod to mid-century style, it can play a supporting role to the rest of your living room.Sioloc Soft Knot Ball PillowsThrow a couple of these grey cushions on your sectional sofa to add some interest or to cuddle with during TV time.SLYYMY Metal Plug-In Wall Sconce (Set of 2)This metal black sconce is a less cutesy plug-in option, which we think would look amazing bedside with a striped duvet and a stack of magazines on the night table.BSOD Mushroom LampWe can’t be the only ones who haven’t been able to escape this lamp for years. But it keeps showing up, and it’s still the cutest thing ever.Sucolite Bedside Table Lamps (Set of 2)Advertised as a children’s lamp set, these certainly have more versatility than that—there’s so much to be said for a small, white lamp, after all. In fact, we think they'd look especially handsome next to your bedside while you're reading or working before lights out.Brightech Wyatt LED Floor LampThe swinging arm and adjustable neck on this grown-up Pixar lamp make it perfect for pivoting to wherever you need light the most (for my puzzlers, this is often a tricky balance). Plus a three-year warranty and an LED bulb so efficient, they promise you never have to replace it.Creative Co-Op Hand-Carved Marble DishWhile technically a soap dish, we think this small tray is perfectly sized catchall for your keys, loose change, or even some delicate jewelry.Cestativo Fruit BowlThis two-tone ribbed bowl is the perfect way to display the fruits of your labor after a blissful afternoon at the apple orchard.Folkulture Fruit BowlAvailable in three striking color combinations, we think this colorful bowl looks way more expensive than its $40 price tag.WINGBO 3-Light Flush Mount Rattan Ceiling LightOne thing we’re really grateful for is everyone’s equal detest for their flush mount lighting situation—thankfully Amazon has a flush mount disguise on sale and with seven different variations to suit your taste.Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Boho Dots Hand Tufted Wool Area RugIf you’re looking to freshen up the living room with an eye-catching pattern, consider this Dalmatian print design from Novogratz.Wingbo 6-Light Sputnik ChandelierWe saw something like this in Jimmy Butler’s Open Door and haven’t stopped thinking about it. A modern light fixture does a lot to elevate the design of an entire space, and this one is unique, on sale, and available in three colors.KIOXOHO White Ceramic Vase Set (Three pieces)You’ll never get tired of versatile ceramic vases like these. After all, they’re neutral enough to remain a staple in your collection no matter where your taste lands on the design spectrum. The best part? There’s even a coupon you can apply for an extra 5% discount.Zens Bud Vases Glass SetIn case you haven't heard, bud vases are in—gather up a few of your fave stems or singular florals for a minimally chic botanical display.Shenmoyl Glass Tulip Wall SconceSconces are so back and this tulip-inspired shape gives a whimsical detail suitable for bedroom, bathroom, or adorable hallway lighting.Shenmoyl Checkered Glass Wall SconceNot all of us have the time to master electrical wiring or the budget to hire a Taskrabbit. Luckily, there’s a plug-in sconce option on sale—one even with glass butterflies.Philips Hue Gradient Signe Floor LampThis floor lamp is a vibe hack—dubbed a “smart LED lamp,” these can create gradient, multi-hue light with color-changing bulbs. Voice control and its own app allow you to set the mood without lifting a finger, so you can create whatever ambiance suits you.Maison d' Hermine Decorative Cushion CoverThere’s no fabric more classic than toile, which brings elegance to any space. We love these as bedroom decor for the way they nod to a little 18th century charm. They’re machine washable, and they can withstand the outdoors, if a garden party is more your speed.JBHO Hand Blown Crystal Burgundy Wine Glasses (Set of 2)Anyone else break 90% of their wine glasses over the summer? Luckily these Burgundy glasses are on sale just in time for red wine season. If there’s one thing Italians know how to do, it’s make a proper wine glass, and we love the shape and breadth of these. These will make you look like a wine drinker who takes their craft very seriously.Outdoor Furniture Deals‘Tis the season to stock up on everything you’ve been eying for your exterior spaces (at a significant discount thanks to Prime Day deals). We've found lots of patio staples in our search for Prime discounts—like comfy seating for the whole family, weather-proof rugs, and even pieces that'll fit in smaller outdoor areas.Jonathan Y Ourika Moroccan Indoor/Outdoor RugPerfect your patio set with a great outdoor rug that's easy to clean and comfy for your bare feet. PS: This one is currently the same price it was during the last Prime Day sale (read: 50% off!).Walker Edison Chevron Patio Dining SetMake room for all of your guests with this four-piece wooden dining set that's built for all of your al fresco dining needs.FDW 4 Pieces Outdoor Patio Conversation SetMaking your backyard the neighborhood hotspot is easy with this wicker patio furniture outdoor conversation set. The bundle comes with a sturdy-tempered glass-top coffee table, plus it’s sun- and weather-resistant.Govee Permanent Outdoor LightsMake your home glow with these waterproof outdoor lights, which are all connected to an app you control on your phone. There are 75 different modes and millions (yes, millions!) of colors to choose from. These are the ultimate holiday lighting solution, but we support using them year-round.Ninja Woodfire 8-in-1 Outdoor OvenPizza party, anyone? This outdoor oven functions as a pizza oven, smoker, dehydrator, and more. And with the Ultimate set, you’ll also get a pizza peel, cover, pellets, and the stand.Permasteel 80 Qt. Portable Rolling Patio CoolerThere’s something so handy about a kitchen island, and you can bring that into your patio with this table. It has wheels for efficient portability, hooks to hang pool towels or grilling tools, an open shelf, and cabinet space for holding any outdoor essentials.BOSS Audio Systems MR4.3B 200 Watt Weatherproof Marine SpeakersYou can play your tunes inside or out with these weatherproof speakers. And when you place them anywhere on your patio or in your backyard, you won’t have to worry about splashing or sprinklers.Danpinera Outdoor Side TableAvailable in seven colors, this weather-resistant side table is super easy to move around. It may look small, but it’s mighty—it can carry up to 110 lbs—and a slight curl around its edge means your book (or cocktail) won’t go toppling over.Smart Home and Tech DealsThe Prime Day sale has every kind of gadget you could want. Whether you're in the market for a nice new vacuum to keep your floors in tip-top shape or Amazon Alexa and Bluetooth-enabled speakers, the smart home of your dreams is just a few clicks away.Blink Video DoorbellNow deeply discounted as part of Amazon's prime day deals, this Blink video doorbell will let you answer the door via iPhone, Android, etc. with 1080p HD day-to-night video and two-way audio.Apple AirPods (3rd Generation) Wireless Ear BudsIt wouldn't be Prime Day without a sweet deal on (very gift-able) Apple AirPods, which are currently 23% off.roborock Q7 Max+ Robot Vacuum and Mop with Auto-Empty DockCompatible with Alexa or Google Assistant, this ever-popular robot vac is also super discounted right now.dreame H13 Pro Wet Dry Vacuum CleanerFor a Dyson-style cordless vacuum worth the splurge, consider this number from Dreametech. It boasts a sleek design and advanced features clean freaks will surely appreciate. Clip the coupon on the page to get it for $100 off.Dyson Purifier Cool Formaldehyde TP10 Air Purifier and FanDyson deals only happen every once in a while, and now’s the time to score an air purifier for nearly $300 off. The TP09 model gets extra points for its sleek, space-saving design, and people love that they can monitor how it changes your air quality (its LCD screen and app displays pollution levels in real time).Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)We can't forget about the retailer's own brand of electronics. In terms of Amazon Prime Day Deals, this Echo Dot that's more than 50% off is definitely worth adding to cart.INSIGNIA 50-inch Class F30 Series LED 4K UHD Smart Fire TVThis 50-inch TV is one of the best prime day deals we've seen. If you're planning on spending chillier weather curled up at home watching re-runs of The Bear, we can't think of a better splurge.Dyson Hot+Cool™ AM09 Jet Focus Heater and FanAnother Dyson deal you shouldn't miss out on is this remote-controlled oscillating heater and fan that can fit your temperature needs whatever they may be.Amazon Fire TV 32" 2-Series HD smart TV with Fire TV Alexa Voice RemoteTrying to catch up on your favorite shows? Here’s a smart TV deal that’ll let you binge to your heart’s content and keep all your streaming services in one place.Kindle Paperwhite Essentials BundleWhen we asked the AD staff about their favorite items for getting through the winter, our audience development manager Kelsey Borovinsky told us she loves the Kindle because she “can finish a book and start a new one without even so much as moving.” Life goals. Right now, score your own deal on a portable library thanks to Amazon's sale promos.Marshall Emberton II Portable Bluetooth SpeakerWhy keep all the grooves to yourself? This retro-looking bluetooth speaker from Marshall will keep you and your guests entertained with the highest quality audio.Blink Outdoor 4 Smart Security Camera SystemIt’s the right time to upgrade your home security with 60% off a set of four outdoor smart security cameras. These cameras have 1080p HD live view, infrared night vision, motion detection, and two-way audio so you can always feel aware and safe in your surroundings. The installation process is simple and their battery life extends two years, so it’ll be some time before you even have to swap them out. And anyway, it comes with an extra set.Sony SSCS5 3-Way 3-Driver Bookshelf SpeakerAt the risk of sounding too salesman-y—when was the last time you evaluated your speaker needs? This’ll do the trick—the trick being eliminating your sound experience to the grainy sound crying for help from your television’s internal speaker. There’s a variety of Sony on sale here, speakers in their many variations, but all provide full-frequency audio with a three-driver speaker system. For speaker nerds, we’re working with 50000 Hz, and 5.12” woofer for “deep, stable bass and detailed mid-range sounds.”Google Nest ThermostatLike everything else in our tech picks, this has voice control capabilities (and an app, duh) so you can adjust the temperature of your home whenever it suits you (including covertly, for those freaks who like it 63º inside). The “smart” feature allows for it to optimize your energy usage and prioritize times when energy is cleaner or less expensive.More Clever Content to Keep the Savings GoingPrime Day Home Deals 2024: It’s never too early to start saving on air purifiers, vacuums, and more home essentialsBest Prime Day Deals under $100: Not only are these deals well priced, they're also 5-star ratedBest Amazon Prime Day Office Chairs For Any Budget: We did a whole lot of digging so you can sit pretty all workday long
html:
Once again, Amazon is here to support your quest for a full home refresh with Prime Day furniture deals. The megaretailer’s Prime Big Deal Days is slated through today, 10/9, and we’re bringing you all the discounts on must-have items. Whether you’re searching for new pieces ahead of winter entertaining or simply sleuthing for a great deal, there are a lot of markdowns for Prime members to enjoy (among other Amazon home deals we’ve spotted).

If you've shopped the sale before, you know that the Prime Day furniture deals are nothing to scoff at. We typically see deep discounts during the two-day event on everything from living room furniture to outdoor furniture, kitchenware to home office chairs.

From top-of-the-line sofas to lounge chairs and barstools, you can start nesting for the season in one fell swoop. Keep scrolling to snag the best Prime Big Deal Days furniture steals of the moment, and be sure to check back throughout the sales event for updated deals. You can also learn more about our Amazon favorites, review our top choices for under $100 products, furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels too.

  • Living Room Furniture Deals
  • Home Decor Deals
  • Outdoor Furniture Deals
  • Smart home and tech Deals

Shop Top Amazon Prime Day Furniture Deals By Category:

  • Best Living Room Furniture Deal: Vesgantti Velvet Loveseat (was $250, now $160)
  • Best Home Decor Deal: Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Wool Area Rug (was $289, now $98)
  • Best Outdoor Furniture Deals: Walker Edison Chevron Outdoor Dining Set (was $1,005, now $736)
  • Best Smart Home and Tech Deals: Apple AirPods (3rd Gen) (was $169, now $130)

Living Room Furniture Deals

Finding the best Amazon Prime furniture can definitely feel like a challenge–there’s just SO much of it to comb through–which is why we’ve gone ahead and done it for you. Whether you’re looking for a modest home office upgrade, some extra storage, or in the mood to splurge on a comfy sectional sofa, check back here to find all of the best furniture deals from this year’s sale.

Vesgantti Velvet Loveseat

This two-seater sofa with memory foam cushioning is great for cramped apartments or even an entryway. We especially like the stylish green velvet upholstery, though it’s available in a more neutral gray as well.

Walker Edison 3-Drawer Mid-Century Modern TV Stand

Go ahead, switch up your tired TV stand for this one with ample storage. Use the drawers to stash things you don't want people to see, like a speaker, records, or extra coffee table books. It fits up to a 65-inch TV, and the roomy drawers will store extra blankets, electronic odds and ends, and more.

Novogratz Brittany Sofa Futon

Our advice? Never sleep on a Novogratz deal, regardless of the time of year. This cute, quilted option functions as a love seat and a sleeper sofa. If the leather look isn't your style, there are a handful of other on-sale fabric options to choose from, too.

Jiexi Modern Boucle Accent Chair

This trendy boucle armchair is fit for reading, snoozing, lounging, and catching up on your favorite shows. Pop it in the living room and throw a cozy knit blanket over top for major hygge vibes.

Christopher Knight Home Kama Patio Table

Build your dream dining set with this table that can live indoors or out. With a solid acacia wood tabletop and sturdy metal legs, it’s the ideal piece to feast upon.

Christopher Knight Home Hikaru Fabric Storage Ottoman

Not only will you be getting a lovely seat with this tufted pick from Christopher Knight Home, but you’ll land some discreet storage space too.

Nathan James Mina Rattan Nightstand

The rattan detailing on this side table gives the piece a light and airy quality that we absolutely love.

Roundhill Furniture Tuchico Contemporary Accent Chair

In need of a new office chair? We recommend considering a nice accent chair over something generic that swivels. This lovely tufted pick will make WFH a little more chic.

Marshall 3-Shelf Metal Rolling Utility Cart

Next on our furniture sale list is this utility cart that'll come in handy whether you use it for storage or as a bar cart.

Sweetcrispy Office Chair

If you’re after ergonomics, you won’t go wrong with this adjustable swivel desk chair, which touts more than 800 five-star reviews.

Flash Furniture Porter High Back Ergonomic Office Chair

Here's another deal for the WFH crowd. This ergonomic desk chair has an understated design to appeal to any minimalist, but it's also available in eight different colors, including vibrant orange, purple, and red.

Novogratz Chandler Indoor/Outdoor Dining Chairs (Set of 4)

Have a little fun with your dining chairs and scoop up these chic blue designs. They'd also look right at home in a kids' room or on the deck.

CANMOV Adjustable Accent Chair with Ottoman

This easy, breezy chair is also currently on sale and there's a foot rest included. Is that a sign to buy two?

BANTI Standing Desk

If you’re among the select few people who did not stress-buy a standing desk a few years ago, you’ve got another opportunity during Prime Day. Banti's popular desks are a minimalist’s dream, and they’re easy to adjust on the fly.

ZINUS SmartBase Tool-Free Assembly Mattress Foundation

This casual (and convertible!) platform bed frame from Zinus is a smart choice if you're looking to outfit a guest room or draw focus to other areas of your boudoir.

Mid Century Modern End Table

The cutout detailing on this end table gives the piece a light and airy quality that we absolutely love.

Furinno Basic 3-Tier Bookcase

Next on our furniture sale list is this three-tier bookcase that'll come in handy whether you use it as extra storage for your home office or a makeshift nightstand.

Casper Sleep Original Foam Full Size Mattress

Casper's original memory foam mattress is 15% off right now, meaning it's finally time to upgrade your sleep setup. Available in a twin, twin XL, full, king, and queen size, sleepers can enjoy the three different layers built for advanced lumbar support and a 10-year warranty on the purchase.

Flash Furniture Hercules Series Rustic Solid Pine Folding Dining Table

This adaptable dining table can be used both indoors and out, meaning you're really getting a great bargain—especially if you love to host in the spring and summer.

Orange Factory Cross Legged Office Chair

This TikTok-approved desk chair is deeply discounted for Prime Day. If you've seen it all on your FYP, consider this your time to score a deal.

Elitespace Memory Foam Mattress

Upgrade your mattress with this model from Elitespace. It stands a substantial 10 inches tall and uses two different types of foam to deliver pressure relief to all kinds of sleepers.

Yaheetech Rocking Chair Nursery

Building a nursery? A design-forward rocking chair should keep things both stylish and functional when it’s it’s time for bed or to settle down with a story book.

Armen Living Butterfly Dining Chair

At more than 60% off, this rounded dining chair with a midcentury-esque shape is a yes from us.

Alisend Small Desk with Bookshelf

This writing desk may have a slim silhouette, but the addition of a riser means you’ve got an extra level of storage space to work with.

Yechen Shoe Storage Organizer

You need a space to contain items you use daily, like shoes and bags. With this shoe organizer, you can add it to your entryway, bedroom closet, or anywhere else that might need a little extra organization.

Cloud Coffee Table

This coffee table brings whimsy into the room without being saccharine about it. We love the modern design element of irregular shapes, which always seem to bring a welcome carefreeness to spaces that can be otherwise stuffy. Not to mention we won’t miss hitting our shins on the sharp coffee table corners.

Belffin 4 Seater Sectional Sofa with Reversible Chaise

If there’s going to be an amazing Prime Day sale, it’s going to be a couch. This one has a cool seaming detail that’s reminding us of Ralph Lauren Home. An L-shaped sofa does a lot to fill your space with little effort, and this one can fit the whole friend group for a movie night. You can stow your blankets in the storage ottoman!

SimpliHome Erina Acacia Wood Bookcase

A sturdy foundation for your robust library and favorite trinkets is a must. This handsome design can work in just about any room in your home.

Winsome 3-Piece Ancona Wine Cabinet Modular Set

Aspiring sommeliers and seasoned wine aficionados can appreciate this dark wood wine cabinet that more than 50% off right now.

SimpliHome Banting Industrial Bookcase

Get the best of both worlds with this shelf that comes equipped with a little bit of drawer storage to discreetly hide any junk.

Bme Vivian Deluxe Bed Frame with Headboard

Here's a Scandi-inspired bed frame with a detailed headboard that'll make your bedroom feel a bit more sophisticated.

CHITA Braid Armchair

The unexpected braided detail on this armchair gives it an organic feel, and a nice 20% off discount means you'll be getting a great deal on your new favorite seat.

Sunmory Tree Bookshelf

Creatively display your favorite coffee table books and magazines with this tree bookshelf that'll surely add interest.

Colamy Midcentury Modern Dining Chairs (Set of 4)

Upgrading your mismatched dining chairs with something sleek (and a little sexy) is easy with this discounted set of four.

Aprtat Bamboo Dining Bench

You could really put this very versatile bench anywhere in your space. We think it might look especially nice at the foot of your bed or near your entry way for easy shoe application.

NeuType Full Length Mirror

Mirror, mirror, now on sale—not grabbing this deal would be an epic fail!

Best Amazon Prime Day Furniture Deals: Home Decor

Lights! Camera! Prime! Looking to get your home AD Open Door-level stylish? To start, we think this Prime Day is the right occasion to finally change up your home decor—starting with your old lighting scheme and finishing with an area rug (or two). Since even the smallest accents can make a difference, we think it’s definitely worth checking out Amazon’s decor selection—especially if you’re looking for the perfect finishing touch to a well-designed space.

Loloi Chris Loves Julia x Polly Area Rug

Google Nest Thermostat

The “smart” feature allows for it to optimize your energy usage and prioritize times when energy is cleaner or less expensive.
